snippet.title: Awful Mario World SMW HACK
snippet.description:
If you enjoyed watching this video, please give us a thumbs up, leave a comment below, and share this video with others! It will greatly help me make more content like this.
Click the link to see all the available content!.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdR_md42QYvHZXYJFazZyeQ/?sub_confirmation=1

Si disfrutaste viendo este video, por favor dale un pulgar arriba, deja un comentario abajo y comparte este video con otros. ¡Me ayudará mucho a crear más contenido como este!
Haz click en el enlace para ver todo el contenido disponible!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdR_md42QYvHZXYJFazZyeQ/?sub_confirmation=1

Se você gostou de assistir a este vídeo, por favor, dê um joinha, deixe um comentário abaixo e compartilhe este vídeo com outras pessoas. Isso me ajudará muito a criar mais conteúdo como este!
Clique no link para ver todo o conteúdo disponível!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdR_md42QYvHZXYJFazZyeQ/?sub_confirmation=1

Author: KoJi
Type: Kaizo: Intermediate
Length: 12 exit(s)

Awful Mario World SMW HACK

Awful Mario World won't appeal to everyone, and that's fine.

It's been a side project for a while now, and a challenge I wanted to achieve.
Inspired by the original Kaizo Mario world, my goal isn't to mimic it, but rather deal with similar limitations and make something playable.

this hack continent:
-no fast retry
-no custom music
-no custom palette
-no map16 edits
-no infinite lives (there's something to compensate)
-no 1F0
-levels with slower pacing

Have Fun!

You might also like...

The Fundamentals of Kaizo! Playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLm2mYL4Q8_rvHMqpt9Mppe7YdCwzgoAFa

SHORT AND FAST KAIZOS FOR  BEGINERS: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLm2mYL4Q8_rsTlDARtjI7D8LCudQB9Wpv

SUPER MARIO WORLD KAIZO BEGINNER
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLm2mYL4Q8_rutyd0370nk9mjTAqDDQIOP

"Super Mario World hack full of surprises and adventures! Give it a Like, Share, and Subscribe for more content."

TikTok @Ouroboros87
